english.segment2: Heaven knows where Id be with You. . As I look to the heavens. . Then I see how Your beauty surrounds me
english.segment3: I wont let go of Your hand
english.segment4: Wont be swayed by all that this world has. . I will look to the heavens. . And Ill see how Your beauty surrounds me. . Oh I will lift my eyes to the heavens. . God knows all my hope and dreams. . God knows, He sees every need. . God knows, sees the joy, feels my pain
english.segment5: God knows, God knows, God knows
english.segment6: Youre my strength in the darkest night
english.segment7: Youre my way, my heavenly light
english.segment8: So I look to the heavens
english.segment9: And I see how Your beauty surrounds me
